001package org.galaxyproject.gxformat2.v19_09.utils;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.regex.Matcher;
008import java.util.regex.Pattern;
009
010public class TypeDslLoader<T> implements Loader<T> {
011  private final Loader<T> innerLoader;
012  private final Integer refScope;
013  private static final Pattern TYPE_DSL_REGEX = Pattern.compile("^([^\\[?]+)(\\[\\])?(\\?)?$");
014
015  public TypeDslLoader(final Loader<T> innerLoader, final Integer refScope) {
016    this.innerLoader = innerLoader;
017    this.refScope = refScope;
018  }
019
020  private Object resolve(
021      final String doc_, final String baseUri, final LoadingOptions loadingOptions) {
022    final Matcher m = TYPE_DSL_REGEX.matcher(doc_);
023    if (m.matches()) {
024      final String first =
025          loadingOptions.expandUrl(m.group(1), baseUri, false, true, this.refScope);
026      Object second = null;
027      Object third = null;
028      if (m.group(2) != null && m.group(2).length() > 0) {
029        HashMap<String, Object> resolvedMap = new HashMap<String, Object>();
030        resolvedMap.put("type", "array");
031        resolvedMap.put("items", first);
032        second = resolvedMap;
033      }
034      if (m.group(3) != null && m.group(3).length() > 0) {
035        third = Arrays.asList("null", second != null ? second : first);
036      }
037      if (third != null) {
038        return third;
039      } else {
040        return second != null ? second : first;
041      }
042    } else {
043      return doc_;
044    }
045  }
046
047  public T load(
048      final Object doc_,
049      final String baseUri,
050      final LoadingOptions loadingOptions,
051      final String docRoot) {
052    Object doc = doc_;
053    if (doc instanceof List) {
054      final List<Object> docList = (List<Object>) doc;
055      final List<Object> r = new ArrayList<Object>();
056      for (final Object d : docList) {
057        if (d instanceof String) {
058          Object resolved = this.resolve((String) d, baseUri, loadingOptions);
059          if (resolved instanceof List) {
060            List<Object> resolvedList = (List<Object>) resolved;
061            for (Object i : resolvedList) {
062              if (!r.contains(i)) {
063                r.add(i);
064              }
065            }
066          } else {
067            if (!r.contains(resolved)) {
068              r.add(resolved);
069            }
070          }
071        } else {
072          r.add(d);
073        }
074      }
075      doc = docList;
076    } else if (doc instanceof String) {
077      doc = this.resolve((String) doc, baseUri, loadingOptions);
078    }
079    return this.innerLoader.load(doc, baseUri, loadingOptions);
080  }
081}
